name: Cove
0:
”Alexa ask Cove Security to arm to away mode”
”Alexa ask Cove Security for my alarm status”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cove security
des:
Leveraging the SecureNet Platform, Cove is the most responsive Interactive Security app on the market. The Cove App, Web Portal, and now Cove Security skill, give you complete control over your security system from anywhere in the world.

In order to function properly, this skill must be used with the Cove Security Touch Panel and other Cove products. Account linking works with Value Monitoring only.
